name: Cowardland
description:
Help the cowards from the kingdom escape from the orc invasion.

Pick villagers on the left and take them to the right.
You can't take more than 10 villagers, and each stone counts as a villager. If you get over that number, the bridge snaps.

Push stones to either side to remove them.

Arrows: Move
Z: Pick villager
X: Drop villager
